Dear Sirs:

I am writing on behalf of Ziff Davis Media Inc., owner of ELECTRONIC GAMING
MONTHLY magazine.  The website, www.opa-ages.com <http://www.opa-ages.com>,
which we note is on your server, has posted scans and content from the June
2005 "Legend of Zelda" story at

_http://opa-ages.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=29932_

_http://opa-ages.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=29710&st=60_
<http://opa-ages.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=29710&st=60>

These actions constitute copyright infringement and are unlawful.  As shown
below, this is the third instance in which we had to contact the owner of
the site about the postings.  In this particular instance, we have yet to
receive a response.  I note that you site states that "Repeated violations
of The Planet's Copyright Infringement Policy could result in permanent
suspension of customer's account."

I am unable to access to webpage under "Please see Copyright Infringement
Reporting for procedures on disclosing alleged copyright infringement
located at http://www.theplanet.com/legal/copy.html"  This page is not live.
Please let me know if you need any further information from us on this
matter. I certify that I am authorized to act on behalf of the company and I
certify that all information stated in this letter is true.

Sincerely,

Tara Garfinkle
Director of Intellectual Property
Ziff Davis Media Inc.
phone: 212-503-3554
fax: 212-503-3560
email: tara_garfinkle@ziffdavis.com <mailto:tara_garfinkle@ziffdavis.com>
